alert.note: Alert for Dane; Green; Jefferson; Rock; Walworth; Waukesha (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 9:59PM CDT until July 28 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Green County in south central Wisconsin... Northern Walworth County in southeastern Wisconsin... Rock County in south central Wisconsin... Western Waukesha County in southeastern Wisconsin... Southern Dane County in south central Wisconsin... Jefferson County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 958 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ripon to 7 miles southeast of Columbus to near Deerfield to New Glarus, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Janesville, Watertown, Whitewater, Stoughton, Fort Atkinson, Elkhorn, Hartland, Jefferson, Mukwonago, Delafield, Lake Mills, Milton, Edgerton, Evansville, East Troy, Brodhead, Wales, Okauchee Lake, Oconomowoc, and Ottawa. People attending Rock County 4-H Fair , Delafield Summer Concert Series , and The Cowalunga Bike Tour should seek safe shelter immediately! This includes the following Locations York Memorial Church, Ottawa Lake Recreation Area, and Pinewoods Campground. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Dane; Green; Jefferson; Rock; Walworth; Waukesha
